title: markusbegerow/local-llm-chat-ssms
summary: Local LLM for SQL Server Management Studio 22 - an open-source extension for private, offline AI coding assistance and chat.

title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: harshman7/insight-agent-idp
summary: AI-powered Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) system with RAG, anomaly detection, and natural language insights. Local, zero-cost alternative to AWS Textract + Bedrock.

title: szilarddoro/allein
summary: A Markdown editor powered by your LLM. Like GitHub Copilot, but local and free.

title: PrzemyslawSwiderski/python-uv-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle Plugin for Python projects using uv tool

title: arthubhub/AI_powered_Shell
summary: This project implements a shell add-on to improve productivity with local LLM usage.

title: CaviraOSS/OpenMemory
summary: Add long-term memory to any AI in minutes. Self-hosted, open, and framework-free.

title: langchain4j/langchain4j
summary: LangChain4j is an open-source Java library that simplifies the integration of LLMs into Java applications through a unified API, providing access to popular LLMs and vector databases. It makes implementing RAG, tool calling (including support for MCP), and agents easy. LangChain4j integrates seamlessly with various enterprise Java frameworks.

title: Ojas1584/Contract_Analysis
summary: Automated legal contract analysis using a local LLM and a 4-call, high-accuracy RAG pipeline with semantic validation.

title: infiniflow/ragflow
summary: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

title: raym33/hublab
summary: 🚀 Open-source Universal Capsule Compiler - Transform AI prompts into full-stack apps across Web, Desktop, iOS, Android. 68+ pre-built capsules with marketplace. Use OpenAI or local AI models (Ollama, LM Studio).

title: mdlmarkham/TailOpsMCP
summary: Secure remote monitoring and AI-assisted operations for your homelab over Tailscale — powered by MCP.

title: PhilYeh1212/Local-AI-Knowledge-Base-Docker-Llama3
summary: A production-ready, 100% offline RAG Knowledge Base using Docker, Llama 3, and Ollama. Chat with your documents privately. Enterprise architecture showcase.

title: deta/surf
summary: Personal AI Notebooks. Organize files & webpages and generate notes from them. Open source, local & open data, open model choice (incl. local).

title: Oceanicabysslesothomonetaryunit652/llm-file-manager-agent
summary: 📁 Manage your files effortlessly using natural language with this LLM-powered assistant, combining intelligence and intuitive design for seamless navigation.

title: Lvsty/AI_SUMMARIZER
summary: 📑 Summarize articles quickly and easily with this Chrome extension using Google's Gemini API for clear, readable summaries.

title: pepito-911/research
summary: 🔍 Explore AI-generated research projects, showcasing code and insights created entirely by LLM tools like Claude Code.

title: Chimdiiii/OpenMemory
summary: 🧠 Enhance AI with OpenMemory for long-term memory storage, recall, and explanation, using a unique cognitive architecture.

title: hesamaria/rag-chatbot
summary: 🧠 Build a RAG-driven chatbot to answer user questions using real-world knowledge from documents, focused on mental health and social policy in Indonesia.
